medical_history.chief_complaint: Cough and rhinorrhea during the Covid-19 pandemic.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of dry cough and rhinorrhea developed earlier that morning, nine days before the evaluation. The patient reported no fever, chills, sore throat, or shortness of breath. He had no known sick contacts or exposure to anyone with Covid-19.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Ischemic stroke 9 years prior with residual mild ambulatory deficits, type 2 diabetes mellitus, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, abdominal aortic aneurysm, hyperthyroidism, and obesity.
medical_history.social_history: History of alcohol use disorder but abstained for several years; smoked one pack of cigarettes daily for 30 years but quit 4 years earlier. No history of illicit substance use. Immigrated to the United States from the Caribbean more than 30 years ago.
